channel.title: Client Help - Splash Screen
channel.description: Ok, i finished setting up my splash screen, i was just wondering if it is possible to set the TIME that it appears (How much time. Eg: 1 sec, 5 sec) Thanks in advance

item.title: Client Help - Splash Screen
item.dc:creator: @Byty Byty
item.description:
@Byty wrote:

I don’t think that’s possible.

When your client starts up, it starts loading the cache and the background. It depends on the size of your cache I guess.

There might be a way to make the background load first though, I’m not sure how though.

Good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Client Help - Splash Screen
